fr.lipn.nlptools.utils.externprog
Interface ReaderConsumer

All Known Implementing Classes:
BroadcastReaderConsumer, ExternalProgram.VoidReaderConsumer, MultipleTee.FileReaderConsumer, MultipleTee.StdoutReaderConsumer, StringReaderConsumer, ToWriterReaderConsumer
public interface ReaderConsumer

The threads controlling stdout and stderr streams call consumeReader(Reader) after initalizing the text decoder (the Reader object) connected to the stream. A ReaderConsumer object MUST consume its Reader data (or raise an exception), otherwise the process may wait forever for its output to be read.

Author:
moreau
